name: L3-3 Test Card Generator
short_description:
ATTENTION: This version is outdated! 
I ran into some serious concept problems, I couldn't fit some essential changes into the old concept. So I have to redo the code with proper layer separation and so on .. that will take a few weeks.

Automatically creates test cards for the russial L1-3/L3-3 tube tester after entering the pinout, test operating point, and nominal values for currents and transconductance.

English internationalization should be working.

WARNING: The software is in extreme alpha state, so bugs are not only possible, they are definitely existing in huge quantities. If you want to use the created cards for real tests, check them manually with EXTREME care first .. else destruction of your tester can easily occur.
summary: Card generator for the russian L1-3/L3-3 tube tester.
